feed.title: Dazed
feed.subtitle: Youth and pop culture provocateurs since 1991. Fearless fashion, music, art, film, politics and ideas from today's bleeding edge. Declare Independence.

entry.title: Lisa Michalik creates 90s Dior-clad bunnies for her latest project
entry.summary: Pairing rabbit teeth with ‘bling bling’ manicures for Parisian vintage shop Snowbunny
entry.content: Shot by Antoine Caillet, the images will serve as promotion for Snowbunny, whose fans include Jazzelle (@uglyworldwide) and Bella Hadid. Check out the full campaign above.
